aboutSection.heading: Welcome to EMS Contracting
aboutSection.text: EMS Contracting, founded in 2013 by Mick Donkin and Kris Armstrong then later joined by key director Daryl Shepherd, incorporates 3 divisions - Metering, Renewables and Recycling.

aboutValues.name: Integrity
aboutValues.content: Acting with strong ethics is a priority for everyone representing the organization as well as the company’s behaviour as a whole.

aboutValues.name: Honesty
aboutValues.content: It’s not just the best policy, it’s a core business practice to act in a transparent, trustworthy manner that earns the respect of colleagues, customers and the public.

aboutValues.name: Fairness
aboutValues.content: Treating everyone with the common decency we all deserve and expect.

aboutValues.name: Accountability
aboutValues.content: Accepting responsibility for your actions (and inactions) is the ultimate way to build trust internally and externally.

aboutValues.name: Commitment to Deliver
aboutValues.content: Creating a great customer experience begins with staying true to the words we speak and the bonds we make.

aboutValues.name: Diversion & Inclusion
aboutValues.content: Organisations succeed by bringing different lived experiences and a range of backgrounds into a shared environment where everyone has equal opportunity.

aboutValues.name: Learning
aboutValues.content: No one has all the answers. A culture of humility and continuous learning is a bedrock principle of successful companies.

aboutValues.name: Teamwork
aboutValues.content: When people work together, they can create something greater than themselves as individuals.

contactInfos.address: EMS, Unit 19, City Road,  Inner man Street, Switzerland, SR5 2BN

scheduleService.text: You will be satisfy with our work contact us today & help is on the way
